data.text: “My heart pounds [DOU] when I think about that.
Listen, all of you, to the thunder,
He causes thunder to be heard all across the sky,
After the lightning flashes, we hear the thunder
When God speaks, it is awesome, like thunder;
He commands the snow to fall on the ground,
And when God does that, it prevents people [SYN] from working,
When it rains, animals go into their hiding places,
The storms/hurricanes come from the place in the south where they start,
In the ◄winter/cold season►, the cold north wind is like God’s breath that causes [MET] water to freeze;
God fills the clouds with moisture/hail,
He guides the clouds and causes them to move back and forth
Sometimes God sends rain to punish us,
“Job, listen to this;
◄Do you know how God commands the lightning to flash down from the clouds?/We do not know how God commands the lightning to flash down from the clouds.► [RHQ]
Only God knows everything perfectly;
No, you just sweat there in your clothes;

◄Can you stretch out the skies like God does and make them as hard as [SIM] a sheet of polished brass?/You certainly cannot stretch out the skies like God does and make them as hard as [SIM] a sheet of polished brass!► [RHQ]
“Job, tell us(exc) what we should say to God;
Should I tell God that I want to speak to him?
Now, people cannot look directly at the sun
God comes out of the north with a light that shines like gold;
Almighty God is very powerful,
That is the reason that we have an awesome respect for him;
